description: This table stores the answers to the timeout questions.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the timeout record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: ISOLATN_STAT_REVD_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether the isolation status of the patient was reviewed prior to surgery.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No (Old)


Yes (Old)


N/A (Old)


Yes


No


N/A

columns.description:

 Category Entries: 


Active


Deleted

columns.name: POWI_REGISTRATION_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the post-op infection registration date.

columns.name: TXP_DONOR_OVD_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
An override reason for the organ check-in.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Incorrect label on box, OPO contacted


Incorrect organ laterality previously documented, coordinators contacted

columns.name: ORGAN_VERIFIED_FOR_RECPNT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the donor organ was verified to match the intended organ for the recipient.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SURGICAL_ATTIRE_YN

columns.name: INTND_RECIP_UNIQ_IDNT_VERIF_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the unique identifier of the intended transplant recipient was verified during the pre-organ recovery verification. 'Y' indicates that the intended recipient's unique identifier had been marked as verified. 'N' and NULL indicate that the intended recipient's unique identifier was not marked as verified.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SURGICAL_ATTIRE_YN

columns.name: VESSEL_VERIFY_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Select the type of vessel verification being performed.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Deceased donor extra vessels recovered with an organ will be used in the transplantation of a different organ


Extra vessels will be used in the modification of a transplanted organ

columns.name: VESSEL_VERIFY_DONOR_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: Enter the ID of the vessel donor.

columns.name: VESSEL_VERIFY_DONOR_ABO_C_NAME
columns.description:

 Category Entries:

A-

AB-

B-


O+


O-


A


B


AB


O


A1


A1B


A2

A1-


A2+


A2-


A1B+


A1B-


A2B+


A2B-

columns.name: VESSEL_VERIFY_RECIP_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: Enter the ID of the vessel recipient.

columns.name: VESSEL_VERIFY_RECIP_ABO_C_NAME
columns.description:
Select the blood type of the vessel recipient.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: VESSEL_VERIFY_DONOR_ABO_C_NAME

columns.name: VESSEL_VERIFY_ABO_COMPAT_YN
columns.description:
Confirm that the vessel donor and recipient are blood type compatible or intended incompatible.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: VESSEL_VERIFY_14_DAYS_YN
columns.description:
Confirm that the vessels are within 14 days of their recovery date.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: VESSEL_VERIFY_ABO_COMPAT_YN

columns.name: VESSEL_VERIFY_INFECT_TEST_YN
columns.description:

 The category values for this column were already listed for column: VESSEL_VERIFY_ABO_COMPAT_YN

columns.name: VESSEL_VERIFY_BEFORE_ANAST_YN

columns.name: SMARTTEXT_ID
columns.description: This column contains the note template ID associated with an Anesthesia attestation.

columns.name: SMARTTEXT_ID_SMARTTEXT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the SmartText record.
